[仌]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – two blocks of ice. Next to a character, they are compressed and stylized as 冫 (which is unrelated to 氵 and 次 ).

[冰]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *pŋrɯŋ, *ŋrɯŋ ): phonetic 冫 ( OC *pŋrɯŋ, *ŋrɯŋ ) + semantic 水 . The above vulgar character in Shuowen Jiezi is 凝 .

[凝]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ŋrɯŋ, *ŋrɯŋs ): semantic 冫 ( “ ice ” ) + phonetic 疑 ( OC *ŋɯ )
